```{r}
library(httr2)


req <- request("https://newsapi.org/v2/everything") |>
  req_url_query(
    q = '`"data science"`',
    from = Sys.Date() - 1,
    pageSize = 10,
    apiKey = Sys.getenv("SECRET_APINEWS")
  )
resp <- req_perform(req)
resp_body_json(resp)

```
